website_summaries.verdict: Creamy to the touch and luxurious in feel, this cleanser offers noticeable final affects on your face.
pros: Customers report that not only does their acne diminish after using this face wash, it doesn't come back
Leaves skin supple and smooth, despite its ability to combat imperfections
Safe to use for those who have rosacea as well
cons: Comprised of 2% salicylic acid, which may be too strong for those with sensitive skin

website_summaries.verdict: Proving to be an effective gel acne cleanser, this is one of the best on the market for treating hormonal acne.
pros: Begins working after as little as one week of use
Works well for hormonal and stress acne
Effective in clearing skin without being harsh or over-drying
Is accompanied by a refreshing, cooling sensation
cons: Lid design makes it difficult to control how much comes out when squeezed

customer_reviews.title: This is the first face wash in my life that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first face wash in my life that actually worked to clear up my acne! The photo was the first night and then a month of daily use
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Worked on Hormonal Acne
customer_reviews.text: I have had about 8 months of hormonal acne on my chin area, around my mouth too. I know it's stressed induced. I tried quite a few things to combat this and I found La Roche-Posay Effaclar system worked the best. I went from 3-5 spots all of the time to 1-2 a week and they are not as bad as they were before and clear up quickly. I use the cleanser and clarifying solution daily.
customer_reviews.author: charmattack

customer_reviews.title: Great for Acne
customer_reviews.text: Love love this. I was using the neutrogena face cleanser with sayclicic acid but would still get a pimple about 1-2 times a month. I have not had a single pimple with this even though they contain the exact same amount of sayclicic acid. I'm so in love with this cleanser. The only reason i did not give 5 starts is because of the packaging. The formula is gel but abit more watery so it always pours out because it is sits on its cap and hence i lose product even time i wash my face. This is not really the cheapest product so that sucks
customer_reviews.author: mercy

customer_reviews.title: Dried my face
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for two weeks as directed: twice each day. Each time I used it, it caused my face to dry out and actually caused MORE acne breakouts despite using a daily moisturizer. After the initial two weeks, reduced usage to only once per day in the morning with the same result. This came highly reviewed and recommended as one of the best acne treatments, however my skin did not react well to it and it caused even more unsightly large pimples on my face ... hard pass!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I used their La-roche pigmentclar foaming brightening cleanser and then switched to this when the price of that went up and it sucks. SUCKS. Does nothing and my skin was destroyed from not using the other. Textured, oily, more blackheads. It literally does nothing. I haven’t notice any cyst acne lately but I don’t get them that often anymore so I guess this may help with that? but I couldn’t say. Otherwise get the pigmentclar it’s awesome for acne and makes my skin a dream. It applies well and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cerone

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using La Roche-Posay Effaclar Medicated Gel Acne Face Wash for cystic/hormonal acne, and it has seriously been the best product I have tried so far. I have very sensitive and dry skin, so I also follow up with an eye cream and moisturizer (because this product can be drying if you don't). This cleansing gel has completely changed my skin in just 10 days, it is more clear, smooth and even toned. I think this product is great for all skin types that struggle with acne, as long as you follow up with the proper moisturizer/skin regimen according to your skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Heals old acne, no new acne!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and quickly!! I use it at least every other day, usually every day. It’ll any current acne goes away much faster and prevents new acne.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann

customer_reviews.title: Dermatologists reccommended
customer_reviews.text: my dermatologist recommended this for me years ago for my sensitive acne prone skin, and YALLLLL. It's the best face wash I've ever used. I've been using it for over 5 years. You can find it at Walgreens for about the same price, but I always order off amazon unless I'm in a bind for the 5% cashback with the amazon credit card. It doesn't dry my skin out and I only have like one small breakout around my period time, compared to multiple huge cystic deep pimples that last for weeks. I usually use my clairsonic with it, but sometimes when I'm lazy I'll just use my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ledet

customer_reviews.title: Very drying, good at foaming , not good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: It seriously dried out my skin like crazy. I have combination skin so.. yeah. The peppermint feels nice and all but this seriously dried it out and just made more acne like crazy. I started to have dry patches on my face. It foamed up nicely but also the bottle is poorly built. It leaks out so easily so it was annoying that I had to tip it upside down opening it and downward and then let it poor out.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Colton

customer_reviews.title: Needs a Better Lid Design
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this brand but a slightly different formula and I loved it. I really liked that it didn't pour out a ridiculous amount into your hand when you squeezed it; wasting product. This bottle/formula does just that. The hole is much larger and you don't even have to squeeze. As soon as you open the lid, it starts pouring out.
customer_reviews.author: GoJacks

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: My husband has horrible acne that's followed him from his teenage years. The poor man had Accutane for most of his teenage years but the problem still plagues him to this day. He was using too much of my dermatologist recommended face cleanser so I found this at an Ulta because he needs as least a good 2% of salyclic acid. He's gone through this second bottle now and it's helped his acne and the unfortunate shaving bumps on his neck as a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Stewieming

customer_reviews.title: Great Product So Far!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Mario Badescu gel enzyme cleanser and Rodan + Fields unblemish to this product. This is an amazing product, feels great on the skin. No weird dyes, and I'm not really getting any fragrance vibes which is great. Saw results after the first use. I would not say the product is moisturizing, but it is not drying either. I understand this brand to be a drugstore staple in France, so I'm hoping with continued use I will see more results. I saw a difference in tone and texture after use for 1 day. I like the way it lathers.
customer_reviews.author: SAW

customer_reviews.title: In addition to Olay Regenerist Cream Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I'm a firm believer in the Korean skin care routine, but unfortunately haven't found any cleanser that didn't make me break out. The only cleanser that has consistently worked for me has been Olay Regenerist Cream Cleanser... until now! La Roche-Posay foams up, which usually makes me break out, but this one doesn't. It leaves my skin glowing. I don't know how it does it but I'm hooked. It's been 2 months and it has consistently been for me. I have combination skin with a mildly oily t-zone.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: One More Time - The Container is Not Appropriate for the Liquid Consistency
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a previous review, but it was rejected because I was talking about the sub-standard product quality and poor container design. Apparently, Amazon thought I was talking about the shipping packaging when I was talking about the actual plastic product container. A company should not market a "premium" product and use a cheap container that doesn't properly dispense the liquid. It's consistency is almost like water so it rapidly spills out rather than smoothly dispensing with a slight squeeze. The soap seemed pretty generic without any positive or negative affect on my facial skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stevoo

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out aggressively
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about a month just so I can see if it’s working or not and try to give it a fair review but it’s done nothing but aggressively break me out. I can’t remember the last time something broke me out this bad. I heard about purging and that might be it but it’s literally been a month and I’m getting cystic acne (which I usually don’t get in the first place) in places I usually don’t so I don’t think that’s the case. Waste of my money. I’m going back to using Cetaphil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's doing anything special for my face. I was using twice a day at first but that dried my face out too much. Switched to once a day and it does good. I like the scent and its soft on my skin. I think I will always have acne but I dont mind this face wash. I'll keep trying it just in case. DEFINITELY better than that St Ives scrub I was using. I didn't know it was leaving beads in my pores. Ladies, if you use that crap, STOP. Use this.
customer_reviews.author: Josalynn Burcham

customer_reviews.title: Made it Worse!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for almost 3 months now. I bought it to battle my hormonal acne -lower face, cystic type spots- now I have zits ALL over my face and I'm too damn embarrassed to leave the house. I used it for so long to give it a chance, but I'm throwing it in the bin at this point. I don't expect a miracle but this made my complexion worse, not even slightly better. If I could give it no stars, I would. And no, I will not call your customer service. I will never use anything manufactured by La Roche-Posay again.
customer_reviews.author: flobadine

customer_reviews.title: Good product in terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: This works well in moderation (too much will dry out my skin). Helps with break-outs. I have to say, though that the packaging is awful. It is made so that it has to stand up on the lid. Yet the lid does not close securely, so the product leaks out all over the place. The consistency is about the same as antibacterial hand gel. I happened to have an empty facial cleanser bottle with a pump on it, and I put this product in that bottle and it works great. Please fix the packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Rainfire

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my acne
customer_reviews.text: I love this facewash- I have combination skin. Currently my skin has been more on the dry side. I'm also acne prone and have sensitive skin. This does not irritate or make my skin extra dry!!! I was amazed, considering its specifically for the treatment of acne. This is the second bottle I've bought and my skin is much clearer. I had mild/moderate acne. Not a whole lot-but a noticeable amount on my chin/cheeks. It didnt start making a difference until like 3 weeks into using it. It doesn't smell good at all- almost like sulfur(assuming its from the acne medicine in it) but that doesn't matter to me at all. I do recommend trying this
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After having my 2nd daughter, my skin went back to being non-glowy and I got little bumps a few times a week, and my cerave wasn’t cutting it anymore...so me being the skincare freak I am, I had to find something good. This is it! I got this along with the clarifying toner and my skin is lovely looking once again. I use it with my Clarisonic and I feel so clean and refreshed after! Despite the acne fighting ingredients, it doesn’t dry my skin out. Just be sure to use a moisturizer or it very well could cause dryness. Overall, if you’re looking to clear up just a few imperfections, or a whole bunch, this is for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Turner

customer_reviews.title: Made my face break out
customer_reviews.text: After 2 uses, this made me break out even more. My acne is not severe, i just had a few pimples here and there and this made my cheeks break out in severe acne. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: MJasleen

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just my skin but I’ve broken out more with using this. I’ve broken out so badly on my forehead
customer_reviews.author: Olisa

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin, first time in 30 years
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my 40s and have had pretty mild hormonal acne my entire life. Just whiteheads on my nose here and there but it's always driven me a little nuts and I've tried all kinds of routines, diets etc. After watching a bunch of dermatologist Dr. Dray on Youtube I switched to La Roche Posay facial cleanser and this acne wash. I use this wash and leave it on for about a minute on problem areas and as long as I don't forget to wash my face before bed I do not have acne anymore. It's amazing. And simple. I changed a lot things at once, but if I stop using this they come back so...it works.
customer_reviews.author: Mahalie

customer_reviews.title: I don't see any difference with my skin
customer_reviews.text: I actually think I've been breaking out more since I started using this, unfortunately. No, there is no such thing as my skin "purging", I've asked my dermatologist about that myth already. Just a basic formula with no scent. I wouldn't recommend, I actually think it's too expensive for what it claims. It's a shame because I like other products from the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great SA cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a derm. for sensitive skin with acne, and I think it works really well. I use this in the morning to cleanse and treat my skin, then I do a double layer of moisturizer. I used to use Stridex pads for SA, to help clear acne and fade dark marks but it made my skin too dry and irritated. Using an SA cleanser is much gentler on my skin and still helps keep it clear, so far. The only issue I have with it, is the fact that the gel consistency comes out too easily from the tube, so you accidentally spill some or use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Rynties

customer_reviews.title: Burns Eye Area
customer_reviews.text: This was "ok" on my face. What I did not like was the fact that there is something "minty" in the formula and whatever it is BURNS my eye area. Weird. Kind of hard to wash your face and totally avoid the area around your eyes. For that reason, I will not repurchase. I much prefer the Pyunkang Yul acne wash as it is scent free and non irritating, even in my eye area.
customer_reviews.author: HT Levine

customer_reviews.title: Changed my skin
customer_reviews.text: The three-step effaclar system helped clear up my skin tremendously. I started using their products in October 2018 because I was sick of overpaying for Proactiv. At first I didn't notice it helping my breakouts but I stuck with it regardless. And I'm so glad I did because now I love my skin! Just be aware that it works so much better if you religiously wash morning and night. I also use the La Roche-Posay double repair face cream for my daytime moisturizer. Give this a shot - you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: effective cleanser for acne prone, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and was even having allergic reactions to some cleansers. I changed to this brand and this acne wash and have better results. Has Salicylic acid to help clear blemishes and acne since I have breakouts and acne prone skin. Not overly drying and won't bother even sensitive skin. A great balance between helping clear breakouts and not overly drying skin! Totally recommend the La Roche-Posay brand and this cleanser. Huge tube and lasts forever. Gel formula so its a slight bit thicker and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: A miracle worker for adult cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: Do you have cystic adult acne? Then buy this. And the clarifying solution and the duo. You can get a 3 piece trial set. Its amazy. Changed my life. After years of trying everything this was the miracle worker. Give it about a week to notice improvement and then after a month others started noticing. I have now been using this for 2.5 years and have had great skin ever since
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have dealt with hormonal acne since having my son 16 months ago, and nothing was helping. I found this product mentioned in many adult acne forums and decided to give it a try since it was less expensive than most other acne products. It has worked wonderfully! I still have some small breakouts, but it has cleared my face for the most part. It is slightly drying so I use a light moisturizer afterwards. The only negative I have about this product is the tube - it leaks HORRIBLY if you try to travel with it! I hope they redesign this tube in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perry

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this for a couple weeks so that I could give a good review. When I started using it, my cystic acne was raging. I was breaking out all over and I have no idea why. I started using this and immediately it started clearing up. Now it's almost completely clear, it's amazing. The best part, it doesn't dry your face out like others. After I use it my face feels soft and the skin feels healthy. Truly a great product, I ordered another tube. It's worth every penny. Best product I have found so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni D.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what all the hoopla was about regarding this product, but it wasn't a win for me. I will finish using the bottle, but I won't buy another. It wasn't bad, it just wasn't anything special or more effective that what I can buy at the local drug store. I have oily and acne prone skin and I have used almost the entire bottle and see no difference. I don't dislike the product and I hope that others have the results they hoped from it's use, it just isn't for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Tatertot

customer_reviews.title: Buy from a real store! Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I have used this exact item for years and it's been wonderful. That being said... I bought it from brick and mortar stores. Right away from using this one I broke out badly... Once I stopped using it, I stopped breaking out. My husband just asked why he was breaking out, I asked if he used this too...he said yes. And he never breaks out. I'm not sure what is wrong with this or if it is real, but I bought another one from Walgreens and no break outs. Possibly not real or has added ingredients that cause break outs
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Works but spills all over
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and would like to give it a better review, but the bottle design is terrible. I knew it came open easily when I bought it, but was careful to pack it in it's own ziplock bag when traveling. I just bought a second bottle, and haven't even opened, but it's already spilled all over a side table and destroyed the finish. There is some plastic around the nozzle meant to be peeled away before using the product. This prevents the lid from sealing, and the product oozes out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something works!
customer_reviews.text: This face cleanser was such an excellent find for me. I'm in my late 30's and never struggled with my skin until I suddenly developed cystic acne in my 30's. I've always had very sensitive and dry skin that changed, and I was lost dealing with the new issues. After doing my research, I found this line of products from a well known and trusted brand and bought the starter kit. I was so happy to see that it worked. I am a die-hard fan and I hope this will be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for double cleansing!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it clears acne and is unscented! The two things i dont really like are first the ‘menthol’ in the ingredient. I dont think this is necessary. 2nd, the packaging. Its a squeeze tube and it can be messy. I hope it comes in a pump. Im afraid to travel with this because I feel like it will leak all over my stuff. Other than that, formulation works for my acne but please take off the menthol ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Dandamilmar

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST PRODUCT FOR ACNE AND OILY SKIN COMBINATION
customer_reviews.text: No other product in the market will leave your skin looking freshed, brighter, lighter, cleaned and diminishing visible pores. I have sensitive skin and because my skin is prone to acne and oils , this product has helped me a lot. I recommend this product to everyone that cares about my skin. Not too long ago, my fiancé started using and his skin improved significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my skin congestion!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with intentions of having my teenage son use it. I decided to try it too. I don’t have acne per se but skin congestion on my forehead. (You know those tiny skin colored bumps.) Let me tell you, it has resolved the congestion and made my skin so much smoother! It has helped clean out the pores on my nose too. I use it with a soft facial brush and light scrub my skin for about a minute. Then leave it on my skin for about 30 seconds to a minute. It has also helped my son’s acne as well. We’ll never be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few days now and I really like it. I find that it does a deep clean of my skin and my pores look better after using it. I like to double wash using this so on my first wash I just lather and rinse but on the second wash I gently massage it into my whole face and let it sit for up to 30 seconds. I can usually feel a very light tingle which I like because it makes me feel like it’s working. I find that this stuff has helped with the small whiteheads I would wake up with every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Iram R

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: I like this facewash. I am 39 with combination/ oily, hormonal acne prone skin, and the money I have spent trying to find acne products that won’t dry my face out is ridiculous. This facewash works... but it’s not holy grail. I will keep looking, but keep this on a short list of face wash’s that I know can keep my acne under control (for the most part.)
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Bad package design.
customer_reviews.text: I love La Roche gel cleanser. I have been using it for some years already. BUT the new package made me lose half the product. I am so upset right now. I left it standing like I always do and realized that half the product was all over my sink. BAD DESIGN.
customer_reviews.author: ljiturbu

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: My face started breaking out after trying a handful of lesser skincare products which I purchased to help my blackheads. Typically at my age, acne is fairly rare but considering I messed up my skin's otherwise decent chemistry because of the other products, I brought on a nice deluge of zits on my forehead. So, caught wind of this on a youtube channel recommending it and boom, within roughly 4 days, I've seen most of my acne fade. I'm hoping within one to two more weeks, my forehead will be totally clean again. As for the blackheads which congregate primarily on my nose, they're still there but thankfully I have this in my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: The King of Kings

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ACNE WASH MADE
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle, bought the larger size this time because I know how well it works! Use for a week at least and watch your skin clear up. Now on month 3 I’ve noticed my age spots are gone even, brown spots gone and mild acne- GONE! Not too strong, no skin irritation, dry but not too dry. This is a wash I’ll never be without! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella L

customer_reviews.title: Irritated My Skin
customer_reviews.text: I think this cleanser might work fine for most people, but something in this was irritating to my skin. After washing my face a couple of times, it just turned all red and blotchy. I know it's not the salicylic acid or the menthol that irritated my face - I've used products with a bit of either in the past year without any reaction. Otherwise, this was a generally ok cleanser - removed my sunscreen, exfoliated a little bit - everything it's set out to do. It's just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya

customer_reviews.title: Silky Lather equals awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of high end cleansers, but recently I purchased this based on an article giving advice from a estheticians perspective. I must say, the feeling of this once it is lathered is phenomenal. I enjoy that there is no scent. The price is also pretty amazing. I am curious to see how long term use works for me. My reasoning for the 4 star review is due to it not being a cruelty free product due to it also being sold I China(insert sad face).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans, but drying...
customer_reviews.text: I have acne-prone, combination skin (mostly oily in the T-zone). I was looking for a cleanser with salicylic acid that does not dehydrate my skin. However, I felt like I continue to get cystic and regular acne while using this product. My skin felt pretty dry in certain regions after use, which I blame on my continued acne problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ge

customer_reviews.title: My Skin is Finally Getting Under Control.
customer_reviews.text: Acne skipped me as a teen, but man it hit me with a vengeance in my early 20s. This is the only cleanser I've used so far (and I've tried A LOT, probably at least a dozen) that seems to be clearing up my acne and doesn't overly dry out my skin. My skin is on the drier side so I still have to go in with a moisturizer, but this stuff doesn't make my skin super flaky, itchy, or red like other cleansers have. I'm only my third or 4th bottle of this and my skin looks better than it has in a couple of years. This stuff is amazing, can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about 6 months and it did keep my skin feeling clean, but I’m not sure it prevented any acne. I have sensitive skin too and it really dried it out to the point that I had to use heavy moisturizers. I also think it “treats” your acne by turning it into a giant whitehead. I’ve never had as many whiteheads in my life until I used this, like this cleanser would dry out my acne to form a hard whitehead. As soon as I stopped using it all my whiteheads went away after a few days and never came back. So try it if you want, but it didn’t improve anything for me at least.
customer_reviews.author: A.Arling

customer_reviews.title: Combo to balanced!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! My skin is really clearing up since I've been using this, and my skin is overall very balanced now, not combination anymore! You do have to stay on top of washing your face daily though. Miss one day and your skin is back to it was before. Also it's not a miracle, so if you're still eating greasy food and touching your face all the time, you'll still be having breakouts
customer_reviews.author: Janeeta

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok wash.
customer_reviews.text: The salicylic acid is low on the ingredients list. My fault for not checking before purchasing. It's an ok face cleanser. Has a slight menthol feel & smell to it. It's refreshing, I use it as my 2nd cleanser in my double cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful face wash for anyone
customer_reviews.text: A prefect face wash to try a chemical exfoliant. Cleans without stripping the skin down. There is an improvement on the softness to my skin as well as less breakouts. Used on oily, acne prone adult skin. Will continue to use and pleased that my skin is looking and feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: River Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely HORRIBLE I bought Monday, and have added it to my routine. I bought it because I read lots of views on how it was suppose to help with hormonal/cystic acne.... I’ve used it 5 days in a row and I see no difference, maybe even a little worse. It has also made my skin break out in hives (it burned yesterday, and had dry patches I thought maybe Bc it was starting to get cold outside) but as soon as I went to wash my face today, it broke out immediately after! Save your money, time, and SKIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really get major acne, just the occasional white heads. But, I mainly suffer from clogged/congested pores, because I like in an extremely humid climate and am always sweating. I just started using this cleanser for a week and it has been helping with my issues and I don’t find it too drying or irritating!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Marie

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and acne prone. After reading the reviews about this item on Amazon, I thought I was getting myself a holy grail but when I received it was ok. It doesn't do much and it smell kinda weird, even though it does keep my face moisturize after washing it but overall not a face wash I would keep using
customer_reviews.author: Mai Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever for adult acne!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I'm 33 with adult acne and this is the only product that ever worked for me!!! I've had severe cystic acne since 18. It's been extremely hard throughout the years trying to cover it up, I would always hide inside because I was so embarrassed of it. Been using this a year now and barely ever get zits! Feels so good to finally go out and do things I always wanted to do, but didn't, because of my embarrassment of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice face wash
customer_reviews.text: I don't have sensitive skin, so I can't comment on that, sorry. Overall, a very good face wash. Takes a little longer to wash off from the face than a soap. The density is crazy! I mean, if you want to just wash the face, squeeze just a little amount from the tube, because mixing with the water it is enough for the whole face.
customer_reviews.author: Mergen Alimaganbetov

customer_reviews.title: Product really works great!
customer_reviews.text: Seen review on this in Allure magazine online and gave it a try. I can say this worked great for me as I have acne cysts, even the doctor didn't have the best meds and this product worked great! cleared my face in less than one week. I have almost none now, I used just once on day instead of twice, didn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: PocoJoe98

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly of all the acne cleansers I've tried, this one has gotten to be one of the best and most effective ones. It's great for sensitive skin and will not break you out. It doesn't really have a smell to it, so that's not too bad, better than a foul smell. It controlled my acne a lot, but of course, I still get one or two small dots during that time of month, but other than that, it works!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Tu

customer_reviews.title: Ruined it with the menthol
customer_reviews.text: Thia has menthol which is completely unnecessary and gave me red welps. It would be great otherwise. Hate it when companies add ingredients that will not add to what you need to fix your skin only for it to have a nice smell. Specially if those ingredients are going to actually do harm. My skin is extremely tolerant by the way. Just not tolerant to having menthol on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality in general of the cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My skin is mixed, and my problem its most in my zone T, I would like to give a better qualification to this product, for all the good reviews, but I can't, it was terrible, the acne that I had got super worse, I continue using it even I notice the acne got worse, because I was really wanted to give a opportunity and enough time to maybe got a good effect, I would really like it was in a different way, I really trusted in this product because of the brand, but it really disappointing me, maybe for other skins could be better, but for my skin NOT, definitely not buying again....
customer_reviews.author: Wilberto Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the shower. A little bit goes a very long way. It cleans my face without drying my skin. It works better than any over-the-counter product that I've tried. I've been using it for about four months and I haven't had a zit since I started using it. I like it so much that I bought some for my daughter. She loves it. I would recommend La Roche-Posay Effaclar Medicated Gel Cleanser to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: This was works great!
customer_reviews.text: This face was is no B S. You get a lot and only need a little. It’s helped a lot with my acne problems. I use it morning and night. You definitely need good moisturizers because it can be a little bit drying but you should be moisturizing either way *cough cough* I love this and will buy it again when I run out
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not as gentle as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: It's not that it's not effective, it cleanses and removes makeup just fine. But my intention was to use it as a gentle Winter-weather cleanser with my Clarisonic as my Summer cleanser is just too drying. But this has that "cooling" side-effect that feels exactly like menthol. Yet I can't find menthol anywhere in the ingredients list. I hope someone sees this and is able to explain which ingredient in the list is the "menthol" ingredient. It's working OK now in the hot, humid summer weather, but there's no way I could use this from November through February. And those with sensitive skin who can't tolerate menthol or medicated cleansers should stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: karhill54

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite face wash. It does not dry me out and really clears up my skin. Ever since I started buying it I have had no issues with acne. I have been using this for a few years now and will not stop as long as this is made.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: All-time favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: The Effaclar line has done wonders for my acne prone skin (mid-30s, fair complexion.) I wear a full face of makeup and one wash in morning shower and at sink at night can still not be enough with many cleansers but this has changed the game. I'm a total brand ambassador and never have been for a skin care line before.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Menthol can RUIN your skin :(
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! The menthol in this, which is a sensitizing agent that totally counteracts the possible good results the actives can bring. I don’t have particularly sensitive skin, but this makes my face turn bright red. Only reason I’m rating three stars instead of one is because I should have done my research better. Maybe in the winter and at night only this product would be okay, but I’m really not impressed and will be shifting to non-medicated cleansers with separate actives.
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Great for combination skin and acne!
customer_reviews.text: This smells really good, and my face feels very clean after using it. I haven’t been Using this Long enough to say that it’s cleared my acne, but I can tell it’s working. This product is good for combination skin, it tightens the skin and eases irritation and redness, however after using this you should moisturize to prevent dryness. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rykel Knighton

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s nice.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but I don’t know if it treated my acne as sufficiently as it could. I would still get minor tiny pimples when I used it. For reference I have oily/combination to acne prone skin. And in the winter it becomes dry in some areas. If you want your face to feel clean then I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: Make sure item is delivered intact
customer_reviews.text: Item came with a cracked bottle. All product was leaked out and the entire package was wet.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Applewhite

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: For those who have problem with acne, I have been using this product for about a month now and it has made a HUGE difference. I use once or sometimes twice a day and I have noticed a huge difference in my breakouts. You barely need any product to cover your whole face so the bottle will last you a long time. Great for sensitive skin! Would definitely recommend. Pair it with a great exfoliater and toner and my skin has never looked and felt better!!! Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Raby

customer_reviews.title: Is this the knock off pond water version?
customer_reviews.text: Okay. Go to the store and buy this face wash. Definitely don’t buy it on amazon. This seriously messed my skin up. It made my skin oily, it made my skin texture awful, the smell of the wash is bad as heck, I have bumps that I’m still trying to clear up, and the new acne it caused was much worse than the hormonal acne I experience, and actually painful. I thought maybe my skin was purging - but after a friend (who has consistently been using this product and ordered it off amazon for the first time) said it was making her skin 10x worse I threw it in the trash. Don’t even bother. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: softpunk

customer_reviews.title: Love this face wash!
customer_reviews.text: I, as many others have used dozens of face washes in my life, this is the first one that I have repurchased many times and is my go to face wash. It foams so nicely and is great for sensitive skin. I also believe it helps me with my acne. The only thing I don't like is that it is runny and as soon as you open the bottle it starts to come out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use if you have sensitive skin/product always leaks
customer_reviews.text: They must have changed the formula. I use to love this cleanser because it was safe on my hyper sensitive skin. This caused so many issues for me I almost ended up going to the dermatologist. I stopped using this and my skin got significantly better... if you have sensitive skin don’t use this. Also, the cap loves to leak... every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRULLY HELPS hormonal acne
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble with hormonal acne for 3 years now. This is the first and only product to stop a breakout and seriously prevent them. I would get a good 3-5 pimples per month that would linger for 2 weeks only to get more start rising and the cycle kept going. I have used this for 4 months sometimes in combination with the toner and Effaclar duo creme and only got one pimple try to show up and went away in 2 days after using all 3 products twice a day. I also have stopped touching my face lol good luck <3
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Not irritating my eyes and face, no alcohol I can tell, I had have used so many products that contained alcohol which made my skin dryer and painful, but this one so far it’s the best for me. That’s why I bough the whole set. Will see in the future if it’s really worthy.
customer_reviews.author: NAN

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dehydrated skin
customer_reviews.text: I have both very oily and dehydrated skin with lots of acne. Personally, I couldn’t use this on my face. Even with a good moisturizer, My face was still left flaky after my skincare routine. I now use it on my chest and back which have acne on it, and it works well dealing with oil production there.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: great for pimples
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 3weeks because I have been getting pimples on my forehead, chin and neck. Looks like there are less pimples pn my face and neck so I’m going to continue to use it. It’s not very thick so you have to be careful when you aqueeze the bottle as it will come out well.
customer_reviews.author: katt

customer_reviews.title: No more acne
customer_reviews.text: Very light scent which I like. It doesn’t leave the skin feeling dry but still moisturize afterwards! My acne has decreased to almost none. Very happy with this product! Great for taking off make up too!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: It's Money Well Spent For Your Face
customer_reviews.text: It gently exfoliates, is not harsh, was a touch over drying I thought at first but then after a few uses I realized my face was just dead. Apply the moisture and bam! It was a great product that I decided to try and was well worth it. You may be able to find it at CVS as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Collins II

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the expensive kind. I have very oily, but sensitive skin. It does not irritate my skin, removes makeup, and controls my acne. I have even been to a dermatologist and I have better results with this.
customer_reviews.author: amh

customer_reviews.title: Best PH Balanced Medicated Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I always come back to this cleanser after trying new products once this one gives me the results I want from a cleanser. Its PH balanced, good for sensitive skin, has micro exfoliants (no beads - this is a clear gel) & gets my face super clean. I do notice that my acne prone and oily skin is more well managed with the Effaclar medicated cleanser in my routine. I use it 2x daily as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Chevel A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that I've seen a big result but my skin didn't breakout at all at first like most new products due to adjusting. My dermatologist just saw that I am using it and says she highly recommends it. It's probably one of those products if you stop using, you'd notice the difference. I wish it had a bit of color to it. I wear glasses so when showering, hard to see how much of the completely clear cleanser you've squeezed out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye acne
customer_reviews.text: I’m allergic to most acne products but this one works great for my face (except step 3, I’m allergic to one ingredient in there). This product really helped my acne. Anytime I feel a break out, I use this twice a day and it usually disappears.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Freytes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sensitive skin! My Doctor agrees!
customer_reviews.text: Just left my dermatologist who mentioned that she loves this brand! I was so happy to hear that, as I have been using it for more than a year. It’s great for sensitive skin. It gets a nice cleaning without drying you out and the added acne protection is great.
customer_reviews.author: RtisticMe

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: I used this cleanser for about 2 weeks and I seen slight improvement, however here I am on week 3 and It had dried my skins so badly it has started cracking and bleeding. Also the bottle leaks. And the product comes out to quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn L. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Really love the product but I only got a few washes ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and after one use the bottle was almost 90% empty. I don't know if it's a design flaw with the cap or if mine was just faulty, but all of the liquid spilled out from the lid not staying on properly. Really love the product but I only got a few washes out of what was left in the bottle :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of the product is on my counter.
customer_reviews.text: 3 star review because the bottle constantly leaks. 1/3 of the bottle is on my counter. This happened twice. I have to put it in a cup, upside down (cap up) to keep from wasting any. It’s a shame because I love the product itself. But to spend that much on it, and the bottle cap be as cheap as it is, is upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Evan a.

customer_reviews.title: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Medicated Gel Acne Face wash, Where have you been my entire life?
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical in using this at first until I tried it at 56 and I still had breakouts and this actually cleared my complexion fast. I use it twice a day, in the morning and before I go to bed. Never has my skin felt smooth and clear. I absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Overall good formula
customer_reviews.text: Leaving my review a month after purchase. This is an amazing product, probably one of the best salicylic acid cleansers that I’ve ever purchased. Huge downside to it though is the packaging. Not sure if anyone else also encountered this issue or if i just received a defected bottle, but it spills so much when placed on the counter. I have to leave the bottle upside down to avoid any more product spills, which sucks bc it comes in a (Not sure of the correct name) “cone like” bottle. Nonetheless, great formula & works great on my oily-dry combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I saw this cleanser recommended in a Youtube video. It really helped clear up my skin in only two weeks! I use this before a toner and a thick moisturizer, so my skin doesn’t feel dry at all! My skin feels smooth and clean after using, and the smell is quite fresh and unnoticeable. It lathers really well, and it’s such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: it isn’t drying and has a nice gentle foam that I like! It is the first salicylic cleanser I’ve come across without added fragrance or is super harsh on the skin. Good for acne prone skin that it sensitive to other types of medicated cleansers. Don’t use too much of other acids alongside it though or it could be too much on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally find the time to write a review, but this product is worth it! I've struggled with adult cystic acne on my chin for years. I've tried nearly every product on the market for my sensitive skin and never saw results. I noticed immediate results with this product. It cleared up my problem area within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time using this product and this line and its now one of my favorite skincare products. I have combo/ acne prone skin and within a week of using it my acne has faded. I recommend it to my sister and she loves it too!! She has acne prone/ dry skin and it doesn't give her dry patches after washing off and her acne is getting less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Vianna

customer_reviews.title: Good for blemishes, bad for eczema
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first. It did a great job clearing up the hormonal acne I have around my cheeks and chin. Unfortunately it started to really irritate the eczema I have around my mouth/nose after about a month and a half of use. I switched back to my regular sensitive skin face wash and saw improvement to my eczema immediately, and now when I use this I notice the redness and dryness coming back after just one use. It stinks because it really did help with my blemishes, but the flaky dry skin I developed around my mouth just wasn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Mickanin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to receive this. First night I used it my blemishes were dry.. by the second night of using this product they were almost gone!! Fast acting & highly recommend!!! Very soft on the skin. Leaves it feeling refreshed and clean. I also apply a little moisturizer after.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Most Amazing acne cleanser Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I used so many products for my hormonal cystic acne over the years and nothing helped. My dermatologist said only acutane would help me and I wasn’t exactly on board with that option. So I tried this as a last resort and I am so happy I did. It says it takes 10 days to work and I started seeing results in 2! My acne is almost all the way gone and my pretty clear skin is back. It doesn’t dry my skin out but gets rid of my pimples. It’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nikoletich

customer_reviews.title: Went from 2 Pimples to 9
customer_reviews.text: Really high hopes for this product with such great reviews. I don't wear makeup so I just washed my face once in the morning and once before bed. I used this for 7 days in a row and went from an almost clear face, to having pimples everywhere. My face feels really good after I use the wash. Normally my skin will break out because of an irritation from something in the soap, but this soap was very gentle on my skin which was nice. Unfortunately it did nothing to help prevent my face from breaking out with pimples.
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this in place of the Clinique face brush, it was so expensive to replace the brush head every 3 months. I have really like this face wash. I’ve used this wash since August. My skin is just as soft if not softer and smoother then when I was using the brush, acne medicine and Cera Ve face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Henson

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to use this, get the moisturizer. It will dry out your face. I’m not sure if it works. I have macne (mask acne) going on and it did not clear up my face. I ended up going to the dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Go To Cleanser for Combo/Oily T Zone!
customer_reviews.text: I have Combination/Oily T Zone skin with light acne! This is my new go to cleanser for my face! I totally reccomend for people that are combo skin types trying to get rid of blemishes and acne! It is so hard to find a cleanser that actually works but this one definitely should be your go to!
customer_reviews.author: JT

product_meta.title: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Medicated Gel Acne Face Wash, Facial Cleanser with Salicylic Acid for Acne & Oily Skin, Suitable for Sensitive Skin, 6.76 Fl. Oz
product_meta.description:
"Amazon is an authorized retailer of La Roche-Posay products.

La Roche-Posay Effaclar Medicated acne wash has been developed with dermatologists. Face wash with [2.0%] Salicylic Acid Acne Medication, helps targets excess oil, pimples, blackheads and whiteheads for clear skin. Clinically tested to reduce excess surface oil by up to 47%, leaving skin less oily throughout the day. Salicylic Acid Acne Medication fights acne breakouts. Exclusive micro-exfoliating Lipo Hydroxy Acid helps target oily areas on the skin surface to provide precise cell-by-cell removal of debris and dirt.

 * Oil-free
 * Fragrance-free
 * Paraben-free
 * Allergy-tested
 * Dermatologist tested

Use as a daily acne wash to fight excess oil and acne. Cleanse 2x daily, morning and evening. Wet face, apply quarter size amount onto fingers, and only using fingertips, apply gently on face in a rotating circular motion. Avoid getting into eyes. Rinse thoroughly. Gently pat dry using a soft towel. Active Ingredient: 2% Salicylic Acid. Inactive Ingredients: Water, sodium laureth sulfate, decyl glucoside, glycerin, sodium chloride, coco-betaine, PEG-150 pentaerythrityl tetrastearate, hexylene glycol, sodium hydroxide, PEG-6 caprylic/capric glycerides, zinc gluconate, tetrasodium EDTA, polyquaternium-47, menthol, capryloyl salicylic acid, citric acid.

Menthol is an ingredient that is used in this product for its cooling effect on the skin.

Product packaging may vary."



BRAND STORY
Recommended by 90,000 dermatologists worldwide, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
